doc.field: GNB JOINS IN LEVERAGED BUYOUT OF FRENCH UNIT

GNB Inc> said it joined with the management of the French company Compagnie Francaise d'Electro-Chimie to purchase the company for an undisclosed amount. The French company, which produces lead-acid batteries, had sales in 1986 of 75 mln dlrs, GNB said. Reuter
